features: 2-way adjustable down-filled hood adds warmth and element protection. Reflective webbing along the back adds visibility in low light. Brim has a shaping wire to stand up to harsh winds
Overstuffed collar adds warmth and insulation while chin guard is lined with tricot fabric for added softness and comfort
Interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over the shoulders
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Recessed rib-knit cuffs with thumbhole construction add comfort and lock in heat
Back vents with hidden snap closures add range of motion when opened up
Hem is longer in the back for added warmth, coverage and protection
Placket with snap closures over 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
5 exterior pockets: secure zipper pocket underneath placket, 2 sets of double-stacked fleece-lined hand warmer pockets with 2-way zipper closures for ease of access
3 interior pockets: drop-in pocket, 2 mesh drop-in pockets
FILL: 625 Fill Power White Duck Down

Whether you're working up a sweat hiking trails, embarking on an urban adventure, or exploring the coldest places on Earth, we've developed the Thermal Experience Index (TEI) to help you find the right Canada Goose jacket for your body, your activities, and lifestyle.
Thermal Experience Index Rating: 3 (-10°C / -20°C): Fundamental warmth fashioned for everyday use.
